Instances from the 2018 Kerala flood are still fresh in my memory. I am still reminded of the water levels when I pass by places that got completely or partially submerged.
But i am reminded more fondly about the rescue operations, and the unity our people displayed. #2018Movie

#2018Movie - Based on 2018 Kerala Floods & Rescue Operations. Huge star cast, Tovino & Sudhish stand out. 1st Hlf took some time to settle down & get into action. Final 45Mins Rescue portion is Stunning. Great Making. Super Artwork, Sound Design & Visuals. Water scenes look so…

For #Kerala: The state survived two massive floods in 2018 & 2019. Unfortunately, no debates are happening while we face #LokasabhaElection2024 Vote to those who protect #environment #forests Ensure potable #water to #public #RTIinfo #RTI #KeralaNews

To all affected by #ChennaiFloods here are some practical tips which worked for us during Kerala Floods 2018. Leave all doors & windows wide open for water to flow freely to keep structures safe, mobile phones on extreme power save mode etc.

Inspite of being stranded like a lighthouse in the middle of 2018 floods in Kerala for 7days, I am still happy with the decision to live next to a fresh water River. Bangalore water crisis reinforces it further. 
#ComeHome from the overcrowded cities!
